channel.title: Making A WebClient
channel.description: So i have jarmaker and i made the client from it and i can use it, it loads perfectly fine for me and i can play on it but when one of my friend downloaded it it load for him but when he tried to log in it said "error connecting to server" any ideas how to change that?

item.title: Making A WebClient
item.dc:creator: @0ffz 0ffz
item.description:
@0ffz wrote:

So i have jarmaker and i made the client from it and i can use it, it loads perfectly fine for me and i can play on it but when one of my friend downloaded it it load for him but when he tried to log in it said “error connecting to server” any ideas how to change that?
